content: nifty little possum to store all of your grocery bags making it easier to reduce reuse and recycle adds a little happiness to wherever you choose to hang it too the pattern is very detailed and important notes are in red if you have any questions please email me at the email address included in the pattern i used red heart super saver yarn in aran baby pink and dusty grey and it was less than one skein of each you ll also need hooks in size g & i scissors safety eyes a 3/4 inch button and a stitch marker pattern is worked in the round without joining or turning with the exception of the legs and tail to change colors at the end of rounds/row i use this method https //www youtube com/watch v=gg4rzdhwg04 note this is not my video
